parameter.name: wind_arrow_calm_indicator
parameter.documentation: Plot calm indicator circle if wind speed is less than or equal to the value in WIND_ARROW_CALM_BELOW (ON / OFF)

parameter.name: wind_arrow_calm_indicator_size
parameter.documentation: The radius of the circle which indicates calm

parameter.name: wind_arrow_calm_below
parameter.documentation: Winds less than or equal to this value will be drawn as calm.

parameter.name: wind_arrow_cross_boundary
parameter.documentation: If set to 'ON', wind arrows are truncated if they cross the subpage border (ON / OFF).

parameter.name: wind_arrow_head_shape
parameter.documentation: Table number, XY, indicating shape of arrowhead X

parameter.name: wind_arrow_head_ratio
parameter.documentation: Table number, XY, indicating style and shape of arrowhead X

parameter.name: wind_arrow_max_speed
parameter.documentation: Highest value of wind speed to be plotted

parameter.name: wind_arrow_min_speed
parameter.documentation: Lowest value of wind speed to be plotted

parameter.name: wind_arrow_origin_position
parameter.documentation: The position of the wind arrow relative to the wind origin

parameter.name: wind_arrow_style
parameter.documentation: Controls the line style of the arrow flag shaft.

parameter.name: wind_arrow_unit_system
parameter.documentation: Coordinates sysem used to sacle the arrow : paper -->1cm, user-->1 user unit

parameter.name: wind_arrow_unit_velocity
parameter.documentation: Wind speed in m/s represented by a unit vector (1.0 cm or 1.0 user unit depending on the value of wind_arrow_unit_system ).

parameter.name: wind_arrow_legend_text
parameter.documentation: Text to be used as units in the legend text
